channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: The State Department and DHS alleged that Hamdi, an outspoken critic of Israel, supports terrorism and posed a threat to national security. A Muslim advocacy group argues he was being politically targeted in violation of his free speech rights. #SamiHamdi
